Two takeaways this morning, number one, I hope that as we look at a passage of Scripture like Matthew 27, as we consider the other verses of Scripture this morning, I hope that you would not be guilty of neglecting so great salvation. I hope that you understand, I mean, every day of your life, how blessed you are to have been given the truth of the Gospel, to be saved by the blood of Christ. But I hope this morning not only would we rejoice in these wonderful truths, but I hope that we'd be challenged to share this wonderful truth with those that we come into contact with.
